objective: Lead software engineer specializing in web applications, with particular emphasis in front-end development.

projects.name: PhyloPic
projects.description: PhyloPic is a website with freely reusable silhouette images of animals, plants, and other life forms, with phylogeny-based search functionality. A public RESTful API is provided.

projects.name: Paleocene (Keesey Comics)
projects.description: Paleocene is a comic book set shortly after the great extinction that ended the “Age of Reptiles”.
